comments: From the Von Staudt-Clausen theorem, denominator(B_2n) = product of primes p such that (p-1)|2n.
references: B. C. Berndt, Ramanujan's Notebooks Part IV, Springer-Verlag, see p. 75.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
